mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_commission_order ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, service_order_id, installment, start_date, end_date, tuition_fee, per_term_tuition_fee, remarks, is_close) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{serviceOrderId}, #{installment}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tuitionFee}, #{perTermTuitionFee}, #{remarks}, 0);
mapper.select: SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, service_order_id AS serviceOrderId, installment, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, tuition_fee AS tuitionFee, per_term_tuition_fee AS perTermTuitionFee, remarks, is_close AS isClose FROM b_commission_order WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};
